long_description: With polyester insulation and a water-resistant finish, the prAna Bannon Jacket helps keep you warm and dry on those days when you'd rather be indoors but need fresh air. Denim-look dobby nylon/polyester has a durable water repellent finish to help light precipitation bead up and roll off. Internal baffle construction holds polyester fill insulation in place. Adjustable rip-and-stick cuff tabs seal in warmth. The PrAna Bannon Jacket for men has welted, zippered hand pockets with an internal media port and contrast stitching.
short_description: With polyester insulation and a water-resistant finish, the prAna Bannon Jacket helps keep you warm and dry on those days when you'd rather be indoors but need fresh air.
